name: Yellow Claw
description: '''Yellow Claw''' is a Dutch DJ and record production duo from [[Amsterdam]] consisting of Jim Taihuttu, based in [[Bali]], and Nils Rondhuis, based in Amsterdam. The duo's music is a mix of a wide range of genres and often incorporates elements from [[Trap music (EDM)|trap]], [[hip hop music|hip hop]], [[dubstep]], [[hardstyle]] and [[moombahton]].
